name: 100th Anniversary of the Founding of the Swedish Medical Association
obverse: Seven circles showing busts of the founders of the Swedish Medical Association. In the middle is a wreath surrounding an inscription.
obverse_inscriptions: GISTREN · GAHN · GADELIUS · · BEREZLIUS · · TRAFVENFELT · · HAGSTRÖM v. SCHULZENHEIM
reverse: A man and a woman collect water from a fountain with the emblem of the society (a snake around a goblet). Resting against the fountain is a laurel branch. At the bottom of the medal is a blank space for an inscription.
reverse_inscriptions: TILL MINNE AF SVENSKA LÄKARESÄLLSKAPETS HUNDRAÅRIGA VERKSAMHET DEN 25 OKTOBER 1908
description: This medal was made to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Swedish Medical Association.
